sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The long queues and delays to channel crossings are partly driven by suspended P&O ferry routes.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03

sentences.sentence: It says it will be ready to resume trips on the Dover-Calais route by next week.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: P&O ferries previously accounted for a third of capacity at Dover. The mass sacking has led to criminal and civil investigations being launched. Other ferry companies now say they have no spare capacity until Monday.

It's not clear if he could be nominated for an Oscar during his ban.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: After blasting off from Cape Canaveral on Friday, the first all-private astronaut crew has arrived at the International Space Station.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The rocket ship carried a team of three businessmen who all paid the hefty sum of over 50 million euros for their stay in space.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: They are Larry Connor, the head of a real estate company, Eaton Stibb, the co-founder of an investment fund, and Mark Pathy, the director of an investment firm.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: They are led by retired NASA astronaut Michael Lopez-Alegria.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The mission, called AX-1, was organized by Exium Space and SpaceX provided the Falcon 9 rocket and the Dragon capsule for the trip.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: It's not the first time that paying customers have visited the ISS, however it's the first time private citizens have traveled there on a US-made spacecraft.
